LanguageData.CGF1_MWP_Building_Gunsmith_Old.label: Galore Gunsmith Table
LanguageData.CGF1_MWP_Building_Gunsmith_Old.descripti: A table for producing older, pre-modern firearms like muskets and cannons in Guns Galore.
LanguageData.CGF1_MWP_Building_Gunsmith.label: Galore Weapon Machining Table
LanguageData.CGF1_MWP_Building_Gunsmith.description: A modern gunsmithing table fit for producing modern firearms.
